claim: Charles Marie de La Condamine was a geographer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The monument was built to commemorate the first Geodesic Mission of the French Academy of Sciences , led by Louis Godin , Pierre Bouguer and Charles Marie de La Condamine , who , in the year 1736 , conducted experiments to test the flattening at the poles of the characteristic shape of the Earth , by comparing the distance between a degree meridian in the equatorial zone to another level measured in Sweden .
